org.jpws.pwslib.global

Class Global

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpws.pwslib.global.Global

  • public final class Global
extends java.lang.Object
    Global references for the PWSLIB backend library classes. This static singleton class is self-initializing.

    Two important global objects are available: the standard application adapter and the standard encryption cipher.

    The Standard Application Adapter
    is by default the local file system adapter but may be set to something different by the user. It is used in PWSLIB by some IO related structures like PwsFileFactory and PwsFile.

    The Standard Encryption Cipher
    is a Blowfish2 ECB 8 byte block-cipher with a random key; it is only valid for transitional data as it is individual for each application session.

    See also ApplicationAdapter, BlowfishECB2

    • Method Detail

      • getProgramName

        public static java.lang.String getProgramName()
        The identifier for the application program using this library. By default this is the library name.

      • setProgramName

        public static void setProgramName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the identifier for the application program using this library. (Content is shortened to max. 60 characters.)
        Parameters:
        name - String with max. 60 char

      • setStandardApplication

        public static void setStandardApplication(ApplicationAdapter adp)
        Sets the active standard application adapter (IO-context) of this package. (See class description.)
        Parameters:
        adp - ApplicationAdapter new standard adapter, may be null

      • getStandardApplication

        public static ApplicationAdapter getStandardApplication()
        The currently active standard application adapter (IO-context) of this package or null if none is defined. Class default is the adapter for the local file system.
        Returns:
        ApplicationAdapter or null

      • getStandardCipher

        public static PwsCipher getStandardCipher()
        Returns the standard encryption cipher of this package. This is an ECB block-cipher and ready to use but only valid for transitional data as it is individual for any given application session. Currently a Blowfish cipher is supplied.
        Returns:
        PwsCipher

      • getImplicitFileVersion

        public static java.awt.Dimension getImplicitFileVersion()
        Returns the latest file format version that is implemented through this library.
        Returns:
        Dimension, width = major, height = minor version number

      • getDefaultCharset

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultCharset()
        The currently active default character set of the Java Virtual Machine.

      • isDisplayUsernames

        public static boolean isDisplayUsernames()
        Whether user names shall be displayed together with record titles. The default value is false.

      • haveApplications

        public static boolean haveApplications()
        Whether this class offers a value for standard application adapter.
        Returns:
        boolean true == standard application is available

      • setDisplayUsernames

        public static void setDisplayUsernames(boolean v)
        Determines whether user names shall be displayed together with record titles. This will modify the results of DefaultRecordWrapper.toString().
        Parameters:
        v - boolean true == display user names

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This performs a short self-testing verification of crucial library functions.
        Parameters:
        args - String[]
